tool_description: The image exposure scoring ability can score the exposure of the input image. The higher the score, the greater the exposure.
name: Exposure rating
title: Exposure rating

api_list.name: Exposure rating

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description:
- **Image format**: `JPG` `JPEG` `BMP` `PNG`
- **Image size**: No more than 3 MB.
- **Image resolution**: Larger than 32x32px, smaller than 4096x4096px.
